channel.title: Paste the ::kill command for me XD
channel.description: Does anyone have a kill command for deltabase? XD

item.title: Paste the ::kill command for me XD
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:6, topic:332356”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=428791.msg3147892#msg3147892 date=1268259202]

if(command.startsWIth("kill")) { String name = command.substring(5); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.youdied(); c.sM("You have been killed by "+playerName+"."); sM("You killed "+c.playerName+"."); } catch (Exception e) { sM(name + " appears to be offline."); } }

That’s like the third time I’ve made that command, use the search button

@Itai, Idk why but I’ve always spoonfed. =
[/quote]

that just makes them lose items, if you want to tele them however you’ll have to add the toX and toY statements[/quote]
youDied() does that already… noramlly.

Read full topic
item.source: Paste the ::kill command for me XD
